name: places/ChIJ04uVyHhZwokRm5RiYlvlNlk
formattedAddress: 8 Chatham Square #C3, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 8 Chatham Square #C3, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
My wife and I have engineering and business backgrounds and we both have been very spiritual and sensitive to energy, so, we were very picky in selecting our Feng Shui master.

Even though we live in Singapore, we came to know Master Pun-Yin’s reputation for many years and through our extensive research in 2020, we felt we could only be able to trust someone of her reputation, so, we pleaded with her to take our case helping us relocate to America.

Even though getting an appointment took months and multiply attempts, we were persistent knowing it wasn’t going to be easy getting an appointment from a famous and credible Feng Shui master like her who most likely doesn’t have enough time to respond or accept all of the consultation requests from around the world pouring at her constantly.

After several conversations, she felt we were spiritual and our hearts were in the right place. Also upon hearing this move involved our two children, so, it’s a very challenging transition in our lives, then, she finally accepted our case.

Once that happened, she was so responsive, available, detailed & helpful in the property selection process, designing the landscape & home, she removed our anxiety throughout. Master Pun-Yin also spent many hours helping us on personal matters guiding, encouraging & comforting us, way exceeded our expectations and what we paid for in every level. That kind of attitude, we felt she takes on cases as good deeds work, money was not her incentive, wanting to help people is because her other investments & big clients keep her constantly too busy. Hence it is understandable that Master Pun-Yin has to be really selective what kind of energy she wants to work with and take onto her wings as clients.

With the tremendous guidance and help from Master Pun-Yin, my family love and enjoy living at our new home in America very much. We do feel the positive changes and feel so blessed to get the help from Master Pun-Yin.

Having spoken with her many times during our consultation, we felt she is simply the best Feng Shui Master who is wise, kind, caring, loving, patience, humble, down-to earth and full of knowledge. We feel so blessed to have gotten help from her. We were very grateful she took us on as her client and felt it was not money that made her chose us, is about the kind of people/energy she wants to work with.

originalText.text: For more than ten years, Pun Yin has been an invaluable asset to our family. Always providing personalized guidance, we have looked to her for support in enhancing our lives for the better. Clear, concise, and easy to implement, her advice has never been anything short of excellent. With unwavering confidence in her extensive knowledge, we have witnessed firsthand how her recommendations have positively impacted our lives. Without hesitation, I wholeheartedly recommend seeking her counsel in creating a home that promotes health and prosperity for everyone under its roof.

originalText.text:
I have read so many great reviews and stories about Master Pun-Yin and decided to reach out to her for a session. She had a very very busy schedule, and I had to wait for almost two months to finally meet her for a session. Our first session was more than 2 hours long, and she was so insightful and patient. I felt extremely empowered afterwards, thanks to Mater Pun-Yin's guidance.

One of the main things that I wanted to meet Master Pun-Yin about was if I should choose Yale or another Ivy League to get my masters degree and which state I should buy a property in for work placement after. She told me Yale because of My Five Element chart and assured me shortly after that, I will get good offers. So, a few months into it, her predictions became true, and the offers were from the best firms in the industry. So, this Thanksgiving was especially joyous for us, and we were SO grateful that Master Pun-Yin was willing to squeeze me into her busy schedule when I really needed guidance in various things.

I know she has been treated as an icon in her industry, however, she was so nice, easy to talk to because of her warmth, reasonings and precision in her messages.  She was so encouraging, caring and patient too. I felt her heart was to do her best to help me be clear and have a good future. No wonder she has such great reviews from people who were lucky to get onto her appointment list.

originalText.text:
A true master of her craft!
Master Pun-Yin is a marvelous person in all aspects.

I had just moved into an apartment in New York around 2012 and my life was in very chaotic state at the time, I randomly started researching Feng Shui and found her...
I knew she was the one immediately because of her powerful positive energy!

She kindly came to help me and organized my space in such a way that the ambiance was extremely pleasing.
Every single person that came over to my place ALWAYS gave me compliments.  I highly recommend you give her a call.

Thank you Master Pun-Yin im forever grateful for your talents :)

I know a lot of people are like me that want and need her help badly, especially since the pandemic, that’s why it is even harder to get a response from her.

If you are persistence, respectful, patience & understanding, perhaps she would feel you are ready to be her client.
Showing humility when reaching out to her, eventually with luck & good karma, you could perhaps have her give you an appointment slot.

My experience was if Master Pun-Yin is willing to take on your case, she gives you her heart & the volume of experiences that come with it, so, she simply has to be very selective what kind of energy she likes to meet with.

Such an amazing person! THANKS AGAIN!!

originalText.text:
Following extensive research, I reached out to Master Pun-Yin after the previous feng shui master friend I’ve worked with for many years passed away.  From my past experiences, I discovered how the art and science of traditional feng shui through a qualified master, can impact our lives at all levels.

I was in Washington DC at the time in 2018 and took me a while to find someone with a solid reputation for a few dozen years like Master Pun-Yin’s who practices the traditional approach.  I knew she was busy, so, I contacted her via email, social media, and by phone. After multiple attempts, one day, I finally received the call from Master Pun-Yin. I felt so enthusiastic and emotional because I was eager to receive guidance from a trusted advisor with wisdom & empathy which I could hear and feel from her voice and our conversation.  After she heard of my knowledge and high expectations in Feng Shui, she agreed to work with me remotely to activate good energy in my new apartment. I knew she has been selective in choosing clients because of her constant travels with projects & investments. The timing has to be right for her.

We immediately connected and she coached me in preparing how to gather the information she needed.  When I received her analysis and had our long FaceTime to discuss, I knew at the moment evermore, I made the right choice, being persistent in seeking for her service. The very specific activations from her led me to improved personal and professional relationships, well-being, abundance, and even during the climax of the COVID-19 pandemic, achieving one of my main goals - moving to Florida to be closer with my family.

I consulted Master Pun-Yin on the sight selection in Fort Lauderdale and designing the new place that aligns with the Feng Shui philosophy.  After living here, I again feel the positive energy activation as I experience greater levels of success. Her Feng Shui recommendations, tied to a great design taste that is practical at the same time, has been exactly what I was hoping for.

After working with Master Pun-Yin a few times just like my friend who uses her service numerous times, I trust her 100% and will continue to work with her as I move forward with my new personal and career goals/aspirations.  She is absolutely amazing and I feel blessed to have her in my life as my master feng shui advisor and friend.  If you are serious about living your dream, I invite you to take action now and reach out to Master Pun-Yin!
